text:
Businesses are running machine learning 
workloads to solve increasingly complex problems.

However, globally, getting enough GPU 
capacity to effectively build, train,

and run your machine learning 
applications can be a challenge.
Introducing Amazon EC2 Capacity Blocks for ML,

a new purchasing option that provides 
customers of all sizes and industries

with predictable and assured access to GPU 
capacity to run machine learning workloads.

reserve the EC2 Capacity Block for a 
future date that best fits your needs,

Your reserved capacity will be available
when you need it.

Train and fine-tune machine learning 
models according to your schedule.

Build generative AI applications efficiently 
by reserving the right amount of capacity
for each phase of your deployment.

With EC2 Capacity Blocks, there 
are no long-term commitments.
You only pay for the GPU capacity you reserve.

Reserve GPU capacity and get peace of 
mind today with EC2 Capacity Blocks.
